hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: PKG_VERSION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The version of Perl to build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PKG_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the download tarball and source directory

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "==== Updating 'jenkins-config.git' repo ====" cd $JENKINS_HOME/src/jenkins-config.git git pull exit 0

echo "==== Downloading Perl ${PKG_VERSION} ====" if [ ! -f ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz ]; then wget -O ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz \ http://www.cpan.org/src/5.0/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz else echo "==== Perl ${PKG_VERSION} already downloaded successfully ====" fi
exit 0

# always unpack fresh source echo "==== Checking for existing Perl ${PKG_VERSION} ====" if [ -d "${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}" ]; then #chmod -R 755 ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} fi
if [ -e "${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar" ]; then rm -f ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar fi

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: echo "==== Gunzipping Perl ${PKG_VERSION} in ${WORKSPACE} ====" echo "gunzip ${WORKSPACE}\\${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz" gunzip %WORKSPACE%\%PKG_NAME%-%PKG_VERSION%.tar.gz
echo "==== Untarring Perl ${PKG_VERSION} in ${WORKSPACE} ====" echo "tar -xvf ${WORKSPACE}\\${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar" tar -xvf %WORKSPACE%\%PKG_NAME%-%PKG_VERSION%.tar

cd perl-%PKG_VERSION%
# now run Configure echo ==== Running 'Configure'; current directory is: %pwd% ==== # -de = use defaults, go on without questions # there's a test in Configure for which file descriptor is connected # to Configure, the wrong file descriptor exits Configure sh Configure -de -Dprefix="%WORKSPACE%\output" -Dusethreads -Duserelocatableinc
